tool_description: Searches for customer accounts using provided identifiers and returns matching account details.

search_type.description: Type of search: email, phone, account_number, or name_combo

include_inactive.description: Whether to include inactive accounts in search

error_messages: Invalid search type: Use one of [email, phone, account_number, name_combo].
Missing search parameters: Provide appropriate parameters based on search_type.
No accounts found: No matching accounts found with provided criteria.
Multiple accounts found: Multiple accounts match criteria, additional verification needed.
Database connection error: Unable to connect to customer database.
usage: Set search_type and provide corresponding search parameters. Use include_inactive=true to search closed accounts.
